alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Marion; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 10:44PM CST until February 19 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Wise, Russell and Scott Counties. Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Hancock and Scott Counties. Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Hancock, Grainger and Claiborne Counties. North Fork Holston River Near Gate City VA affecting Hawkins, Sullivan and Scott Counties. Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County. Powell River Near Arthur TN affecting Claiborne and Union Counties. Powell River Near Jonesville VA affecting Hancock and Lee Counties. Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Bledsoe, Sequatchie and Marion Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sequatchie River near Whitwell TN. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural land occurs. At 16.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural land becomes more extensive. Water reaches the bottom of the river gage house. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 12.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 15.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 400 AM EST /300 AM CST/.
